A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her progress, various sorts of turmoil in her D-day Life – Mom-Madam; an unscrupulous aura; limo & horses; hangovers – and in the horse’s life at the stable, she prepares herself, steals away , and goes for it. Neither of them come back.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, which he spent intensively reading books, and his young adulthood in Chicago, which proved to be a formative experience.
